name: Can’t Let You Go
content: I never knew I meet a girl like you
And I know you need me too
In my eyes you are the only one
Come on let's have some fun
I know you feeling  it too
Now I know what to do
I won't let you to go
Just let the beat go on and on
Come on come on come on Lets do it
Come on come on come on Just do it

Come on come on come on Just do it
I know you feeling  it too
Now I know what to do
I won't let you to go
Just let the beat go on and on
Just let the beat go on and on
Come on come on come on Lets do it
Come on come on come on Just do it
